mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge (status, type, start_dt, end_dt, goal_cnt, achieve_cnt, user_id) VALUES (#{status}, #{type}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{goalCnt}, #{achievedCnt}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE challenge SET achieve_cnt = achieve_cnt + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE challenge SET status = CASE WHEN end_dt = #{today} THEN 'DONE' WHEN start_dt = #{today} THEN 'ONGOING' ELSE status END WHERE start_dt = #{today} OR end_dt = #{today}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM challenge WHERE status = 'ONGOING'
